item.author: geekswg@qq.com (geekswg)
item.description: <!DOCTYPE html> 2048 2048 0 0 Join the numbers and get to the 2048 tile! New Game Keep going Try again How to play: Use your arrow keys to move the tiles. When two tiles with the same number touch, they merge into one! Note: This site is the official version of 2048. You can play it on your phone via http://git.io/2048. All other apps or sites are derivatives or fakes, and should be used with caution.
